## MakeVectorNode.(constructor)

Creates a new make vector node

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor();
```

## Remarks

Initializes with 4 optional input slots (a, b, c, d). At least one input must be connected. Unused trailing inputs can be left disconnected.
